name: Frag 'Em!
description:
Frag 'Em! is a top-down multiplayer shooter with multiple game modes and maps!

Currently Frag 'Em! is still in development so there's only a limited number of modes/maps

The maps currently in the game are:

  • Farmhouse
  • Factory
  • Caverns
  • Arena
  • Subway

The modes currently in the game are:

  • Deathmatch
  • Pistol Fight

More features are getting added quickly so make sure to check frequently for new maps or modes!

I'll also add options to change the graphics and controls later!

Controls :

  • WASD to move
  •  SHIFT to crouch (let's you dodge bullets when behind cover)
  • LMB to shoot
  • F1 to take a screenshot

Also, please comment below so I'll have a better idea of what should to be fixed and/or added!
